data.title: Manitoulin Genealogy: birth index Mac
data.text:
Manitoulin Genealogy: birth index Mac-Mc

Birth Index - Surname Mac-Mc

Back to

Home Page

This page last updated on Tuesday, 11-Sep-2018 01:32:26 MDT

You will find below, a list of births beginning with the alpha letter Mac-Mc. These are gleaned from several sources. The sources, for your benefit, are listed at the end of each announcement. The source has not always been verified and therefore, subject to error. Birth Announcements from the Manitoulin Expositor may be found on the Manitoulin Message board and these are linked. Birth announcements beginning in the year 2001 may also be read in their entirety at the Ontario Genealogical Society - Sudbury Branch site. Original newspapers are held at the Manitoulin Expositor for one year; all Birth Announcements are printed with permission of the Manitoulin Expositor. Any OVR number printed is the record number of the birth at Ontario Vital Records.

TAMMY AYRE McALLISTER - David and Heather McAllister are happy to announce the safe arrival of their daughter Tammy Ayre, born on Wednesday, September 10, 1980 weighing 7 lbs. 6 oz. in Mindemoya Red Cross Hospital. Tammy is a new sister for Tracey. Proud grandparents are Peter and Irma McAllister and Don and Jean Tremblay. We would like to give a very special thank you to Dr. McQuay and staff for Tammyï¿½s safe arrival and the excellent care during our stay. Manitoulin Expositor, October 1, 1980

ROBERT STANLEY MARK McGRAW - Robert and Jenny (nee Francis) are pleased to announce the safe arrival of their first child, a son, Robert Stanley Mark weighing 6 lbs. 10 o. at McKellar General Hospital; Thunder Bay, Ontario at 2:57 am March 22, 1980. Proud grandparents are Mr. and Mrs. Ken Francis of Little Current and Mrs. Betty Saellens of Tilsonburg.
